stepsDesktop.label: We need your phone number that you register your raw account with (or planning to do so)

descr.text: We won’t share your number with anyone and will not use it for anything except connection you with your crush on RAW

stepsDesktop.label: We need your beloved one name and contact point to invite them to RAW

descr.text:
Press SEND means you read our
Privacy Policy and ready for LOVE

stepsMobile.label: What’s your number?
stepsMobile.supLabel: Provide the phone number you register your raw account with (or plan to do). We’ll ping you when your crush signs up

descr.text: We won’t share your number with anyone and will not use it for anything except connection you with your crush on RAW

stepsMobile.label: What’s their name?
stepsMobile.supLabel: We need your beloved one name to know how we should call them

stepsMobile.label: What’s their contact?
stepsMobile.supLabel: We need your beloved one contact point (e-mail or socials) to invite them to RAW

descr.text: Press SEND means you read our Privacy Policy and ready for LOVE

compliments.text:
There’s just something about you that I can’t resist… 

I want to get to know you better and see where things go. Take a chance and explore with me?

I’ve been crushing on you for a while, and I think we could be something special. 

Let’s connect and see if there’s a spark.

I can’t stop thinking about you, I want to see if we have a connection. 

Let’s do something together and see where it takes us.

Roses are red, violets are blue – I can’t stop thinking about you. 

Want to see if we can make a connection too?

When you’re nearby, my heart skips a beat. Your beauty and grace leave me in awe. 

I can’t wait to get to know you better and see where we end up.

You’re always on my mind, all day and all night. 

I can’t help but imagine what’s in store for our future. Let’s take a chance and see what we could do together.

My heart has been searching for you my whole life. 

I’m grateful to have found you, and I don’t want waste the chance. Let’s see where this love story goes.

You make my heart skip a beat. 

Want to see if there’s a spark between us?

I’ve been crushing on you for so long, I think it’s time we do something about it. 

Want to see if we’re a match?

You’re the one that got away…until now. 

Let’s make up for lost time and start something now.

Life’s an adventure, I want to explore it with you… 

Want to see where this journey goes?

Get ready for something wild, because you’re on my most wanted list. 

Let’s make a connection and see what happens next.

I’m going out on a wire to invite you to join me. 

Are you ready to take a risk and start a new adventure together?

Our love is a spell that takes two to cast. 

Let’s go for it and make a bond that’s magical.

Hey there, my message might make your heart race. 

But it’s a chance to start something new, face-to-face.
I hope this not doesn’t come off as absurd, but I want to explore our potential word-by-word.

I couldn’t resist sending you a message, hoping it might make your heart race… 

You’ve caught my attention, and I’m excited to see where this takes us.
